prompt:
The street dealer cut his heroin supply with fentanyl to maximize profits, leading to a string of fatal overdoses in the neighborhood.
Paramedics rushed to the scene where a young man lay unconscious from a fentanyl-laced pill that he bought thinking it was just Xanax.
In the dimly lit motel room, the addict's veins bulged as he chased the euphoric high from injecting pure fentanyl.
Border agents seized a massive shipment of fentanyl hidden in truck tires, enough to kill thousands if it hit the black market.
